AtkChrId.Wiki: The character ID to define the attacker parameters for.

DefChrId.Wiki: The character ID to define the defender parameters for.

Dist.Wiki: The maximum distance the throw is allowed to occur at. In metres.

DiffAngMin.Wiki: The minimum angular difference range between own direction and opponent's direction. In degrees.

DiffAngMax.Wiki: The maximum angular difference range between own direction and opponent's direction. In degrees.

upperYRange.Wiki: The throw will not proceed unless the relative distance of the Y-axis from the attacker to the defender is less than this value.

lowerYRange.Wiki: The throw will not proceed unless the relative distance of the Y-axis from the attacker to the defender is above this value.

diffAngMyToDef.Wiki: The angular difference between the vector in front of the attacker and the vector in the direction from the attacker to the defender. If it is larger than this value, the throw will not proceed.

throwTypeId.Wiki: The throw type ID for this throw. Linked to the throwTypeId field in the AtkParam.

atkAnimId.Wiki: The animation ID for the attacker when performing the throw (linked with EzState).

defAnimId.Wiki: The animation ID for the defender when performing the throw (linked with EzState).

escHp.Wiki: The amount of 'HP' the throw has. A player can 'resist' the throw, reducing the throw's resistance per escape cycle. If the resistance is lower than 0, the player is released from the throw.

selfEscCycleTime.Wiki: The duration of the throw escape cycle for the player. This is the interval that the player can reduce the throw's resistance in. In milliseconds.

sphereCastRadiusRateTop.Wiki: The ratio of the upper radius when using the sphere cast (this determines if a throw connects).

sphereCastRadiusRateLow.Wiki: The ratio of the lower radius when using the sphere cast (this determines if a throw connects).

PadType.Wiki: The operation type for the throw.

AtkEnableState.Wiki: The state type in which the attacker may perform the throw.

atkSorbDmyId.Wiki: The dummy polygon used to spawn the sphere cast which determines if a throw connects.

defSorbDmyId.Wiki: The dummy polygon used to spawn the sphere cast which determines if a throw connects.

throwType.Wiki: The throw type for this throw.

selfEscCycleCnt.Wiki: The number of throw escape cycles a player has during this throw.

dmyHasChrDirType.Wiki: The direction of the throw hold dummy polygon ID when a throw occurs.

isTurnAtker.Wiki: If ON, the attacker can turn during the throw.

isSkipWepCate.Wiki: If ON, the attacker's weapon category check is skipped.

isSkipSphereCast.Wiki: If ON, the sphere cast is skipped.
